Magic Notes:
Simple Somatics: Suffers no arcane spell failure in light armor

Arcane Spell Failure: 25%
Cantrips: May cast 0-level spells
Dazing Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes dazed (spell save or Will neg) for spell level rd; uses +3 spell slot
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Improved Counterspell: May counterspell using a higher-level spell from same school

Summon Monster: May cast Summon Monster VIII, lasting 15 min, when eidolon not present 2/dy
Transposition: May use Maker's Call to swap places w/eidolon

Limbs (Legs) Evolution: 1 pairs of legs give +10 speed
Ability Score Increase: +3 distributed among eidolon abilities
Bite Evolution: Bite attack inflicts 2d6+14 HP
Claws Evolution: Claw attacks inflict 1d8+14 HP each
Companion Darkvision: 60' b/w vision in darkness
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Devotion: +4 Will vs. enchantment
Flight Evolution: 30' Fly
Gills Evolution: May breathe underwater
Limbs (Arms) Evolution: Has 1 pairs of arms
Link (Summoner): May communicate on same plane w/eidolon over any distance/Shares magic item slots w/eidolon
Magic Attacks Evolution: Natural attacks count as magic and aligned
Multiattack: Reduces additional attack penalty to -2 or gives second attack at -5
Pincers Evolution: Pincer attacks inflict 2d6+7 HP each
Share Spells (Summoner): May cast spells that affect self on eidolon as touch spells
Slam Evolution: Slam attacks inflict 2d8+14 HP each
Swim Evolution: 30' Swim
Tentacle Evolution: Tentacle attacks inflict 1d8+7 HP each
Wing Buffet Evolution: 2 wing attacks inflict 1d8+7 HP each
